channel.title: Server problems when i click runserver or compile says file not found?
channel.description:
when i click compile or run server it says npc.cfg: file not found. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
and my npc.cfg file is right there..anyone know how to get this working or what? its making me really mad and i cant do anything because without that i cant attack monsters whitch is bs[br][size=1]Posted at: August 25, 2006, 02:18:36 AM[/size][hr]help me plz [br][size=1]Posted at: August 25, 2006, 02:49:57 AM[/size][hr]help plz

item.title: Server problems when i click runserver or compile says file not found?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

you need to change it to

@echo off COLOR 0F title SERVER NAME HERE Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
change the _07 to _08 or _06 if that doesnt work

Read full topic
